xyz.swatt.testng.reporters

Class TestNgMatrixReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.swatt.testng.reporters.TestNgMatrixReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.testng.IReporter, org.testng.ITestNGListener

    public class TestNgMatrixReporter
extends Object
implements org.testng.IReporter
    Will generate a Test Matrix Style report, with Pass Rates.

    Note: File name is set by reportFileName.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String outputDirectoryOverride
      If set, the Report File will be placed in this directory, instead of the default Test Output directory.
      static String reportFileName
      The name of the Report File to create (minus the ".html" extension).

    • Method Detail

      • addKnownError

        public static void addKnownError(String _bugId)
        Will take in a Bug Id and report it as an error at the end of Regressions.

        (This is to be used for known bugs that have workaround in the Test Code.)

        Note: Errors that happen below the Test Method (in stack trace), will only be counted once, per Test Method.

        Parameters:
        _bugId - The Identifier of the bug to be reported.

      • generateReport

        public void generateReport(List<org.testng.xml.XmlSuite> xmlSuites,
                           List<org.testng.ISuite> suites,
                           String outputDirectoryPath)
        Constructs a Test Matrix style report.
        Specified by:
        generateReport in interface org.testng.IReporter
        Parameters:
        xmlSuites - The TestNG XML Test Suites.
        suites - The TestNG XML Test Suites' results.
        outputDirectoryPath - Where to write the output file(s).
        See Also:
        IReporter.generateReport(List, List, String)
